insert into LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF (SOL_ID,PROPOSAL_NUM,PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,PAR_PROPOSAL_NUM,PAR_PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,FORACID,CUST_ID,REL_PARTY_DETAILS,UNDO_FLG,POST_SANC_DATE,RCRE_TIME,USER_ID,OLD_ADD_DEL,NEW_ADD_DEL,POST_SANC_TYPE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N',TO_DATE((SELECT TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),SYSDATE,?,?,?,'ADEL_GUAR')
select * from facilities f, facility_corp fc where f.facility_code=fc.COM_FACID and fc.COM_BANKSCHEME='078' and f.FACILITY_APPNO='^'
Select a.inw_leadno from APPINWARDREG a,APPLICATIONS al Where al.APP_INWARDNO=a.INWARD_NO and al.APP_NO='^' and a.inw_leadno!='NA'

Select org.org_scode sol_id,fac.FACILITY_APPNO APP_NO,fac.FACILITY_SNO as SlNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_NO PARENT_APPNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_SNO PARENT_SLNO ,(Select PERAPP_CBSID from perApplicant where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as cbsid,(select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) CBS_ACCOUNTNO,post.PS_MODIFY_TERMS,post.DEC_LIMIT_EMI, (Select PERAPP_CONSTITUTION from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as PERAPP_CONSTITUTION, to_char(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,fc.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS, to_char(CASE WHEN fac.FACILITY_MONTHS='0' THEN fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE WHEN fac.FACILITY_MONTHS='' THEN fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE ELSE ADD_MONTHS(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS-oldfac.FACILITY_MONTHS) END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS due_tn from applications appl join facilities fac on fac.FACILITY_APPNO=appl.app_no join app_post_sanction post on post.ps_app_no=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and post.PS_APP_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO join ORGANISATIONS org on org.org_code=appl.APP_ORGCODE join COM_DEMOGRAPHICS pd on pd.DEMO_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO join facility_corp fc on fc.COM_FACID=fac.facility_code join FACILITIES_PS oldfac on oldfac.FACILITY_PROPOSEDSNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO and oldfac.FACILITY_PROPOSEDAPPNO=fac.FACILITY_APPNO where appl.APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and appl.APP_RENEW_FLAG='P' and fac.facility_sancstatus='A' and (select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) is not null and (select cop.COM_LOANACC from com_otherdet cop where cop.FACILITY_CODE = fac.facility_code) ='Y' and appl.APP_NO='^'

Select org.org_scode sol_id,fac.FACILITY_APPNO APP_NO,fac.FACILITY_SNO as SlNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_NO PARENT_APPNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_SNO PARENT_SLNO ,(Select PERAPP_CBSID from perApplicant where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as cbsid,(select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) CBS_ACCOUNTNO,post.PS_MODIFY_TERMS,post.DEC_LIMIT_EMI, (Select PERAPP_CONSTITUTION from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as PERAPP_CONSTITUTION, to_char(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,fc.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS,fc.FAC_REPAYTYPE from applications appl join facilities fac on fac.FACILITY_APPNO=appl.app_no join app_post_sanction post on post.ps_app_no=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and post.PS_APP_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO join ORGANISATIONS org on org.org_code=appl.APP_ORGCODE join COM_DEMOGRAPHICS pd on pd.DEMO_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO join facility_corp fc on fc.COM_FACID=fac.facility_code where appl.APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and appl.APP_RENEW_FLAG='P' and fac.facility_sancstatus='A' and (select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) is not null and (select cop.COM_LOANACC from com_otherdet cop where cop.FACILITY_CODE = fac.facility_code) ='Y' and fac.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and fac.FACILITY_SNO='^'

Select org.org_scode sol_id,fac.FACILITY_APPNO APP_NO,fac.FACILITY_SNO as SlNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_NO PARENT_APPNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_SNO PARENT_SLNO ,(Select PERAPP_CBSID from perApplicant where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as cbsid,(select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) CBS_ACCOUNTNO,post.PS_MODIFY_TERMS,post.DEC_LIMIT_EMI, (Select PERAPP_CONSTITUTION from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as PERAPP_CONSTITUTION, to_char(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,fc.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS, to_char(CASE WHEN fac.FACILITY_MONTHS='0' THEN fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE WHEN fac.FACILITY_MONTHS='' THEN fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE ELSE ADD_MONTHS(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS-oldfac.FACILITY_MONTHS) END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS due_tn,fc.FAC_REPAYTYPE from applications appl join facilities fac on fac.FACILITY_APPNO=appl.app_no join app_post_sanction post on post.ps_app_no=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and post.PS_APP_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO join ORGANISATIONS org on org.org_code=appl.APP_ORGCODE join COM_DEMOGRAPHICS pd on pd.DEMO_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO join facility_corp fc on fc.COM_FACID=fac.facility_code join FACILITIES_PS oldfac on oldfac.FACILITY_PROPOSEDSNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO and oldfac.FACILITY_PROPOSEDAPPNO=fac.FACILITY_APPNO where appl.APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and appl.APP_RENEW_FLAG='P' and fac.facility_sancstatus='A' and (select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) is not null and (select cop.COM_LOANACC from com_otherdet cop where cop.FACILITY_CODE = fac.facility_code) ='Y' and fac.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and fac.FACILITY_SNO='^'
insert into CBS_API_LOG (CBS_API_APP_NO,CBS_REQUEST,CBS_RESPONSE,CBS_API_SEQUENCE_NO,CBS_API_DESCRIPTION,CBS_TRN_NUM,CBS_API_STATUS,CBS_API_TIME) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,SYSTIMESTAMP)
insert into CBS_API_LOG (CBS_API_APP_NO,CBS_REQUEST,CBS_RESPONSE,CBS_API_SEQUENCE_NO,CBS_API_DESCRIPTION,CBS_API_ERROR_MESSAGE,CBS_API_STATUS,CBS_API_TIME) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,SYSTIMESTAMP)

select a.app_no as FACILITY_APPNO,to_char(a.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate,1 as FACILITY_SNO,a.APP_APPROVEDBY,decode(a.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corp','A','Agri') APP_LOANTYPE,a.APP_APPLNHOLDER,a.APP_USRID from applications a where trunc(a.APP_PROCESSDATE) between '^' and '^' and a.app_status='pa' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG != 'P' and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' minus select a.app_no as FACILITY_APPNO,to_char(a.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate,1 as FACILITY_SNO,a.APP_APPROVEDBY,decode(a.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corp','A','Agri') APP_LOANTYPE,a.APP_APPLNHOLDER,a.APP_USRID from applications a,products b,mis_appdetails c, prd_activitycodes d where trunc(a.APP_PROCESSDATE) between '^' and '^' and a.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and a.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and c.app_no=a.app_no and a.app_prdcode=b.prd_code and d.prdact_prdcode=a.app_prdcode and d.PRDACT_MODULE='p' and d.prdact_activitycode like '%'||c.APP_ACTIVITYCODE||'%'
union all
select a.FACILITY_APPNO,to_char(ap.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate,a.FACILITY_SNO,ap.APP_APPROVEDBY, decode(ap.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corp','A','Agri') APP_LOANTYPE,ap.APP_APPLNHOLDER,ap.APP_USRID from facilities a,APPLICATIONS ap where a.FACILITY_APPNO=ap.APP_NO and trunc(ap.APP_PROCESSDATE) between '^' and '^' and ap.APP_STATUS='pa' and ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and ap.APP_LOANTYPE='C' minus select a.FACILITY_APPNO,to_char(ap.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, a.FACILITY_SNO,ap.APP_APPROVEDBY,decode(ap.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corp','A','Agri') APP_LOANTYPE, ap.APP_APPLNHOLDER,ap.APP_USRID from facilities a,FACILITY_CORP b ,mis_appdetails c, prd_activitycodes d,APPLICATIONS ap where a.FACILITY_APPNO=ap.APP_NO and a.FACILITY_APPNO=ap.app_no and c.APP_FACILITY_SNO=a.FACILITY_SNO and trunc(ap.APP_PROCESSDATE) between '^' and '^' and ap.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.FACILITY_TYPEFOR != 'P' and c.app_no=a.FACILITY_APPNO and ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and a.FACILITY_CODE=b.COM_FACID and d.prdact_prdcode=a.FACILITY_CODE and d.PRDACT_MODULE in ('c') and d.prdact_activitycode like '%'||c.APP_ACTIVITYCODE||'%' and ap.APP_LOANTYPE='C'
union all
select a.FACILITY_APPNO,to_char(ap.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate,a.FACILITY_SNO,ap.APP_APPROVEDBY, decode(ap.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corp','A','Agri') APP_LOANTYPE,ap.APP_APPLNHOLDER,ap.APP_USRID from facilities a,APPLICATIONS ap where a.FACILITY_APPNO=ap.APP_NO and trunc(ap.APP_PROCESSDATE) between '^' and '^' and ap.APP_STATUS='pa' and ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and ap.APP_LOANTYPE='A' minus select a.FACILITY_APPNO,to_char(ap.app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, a.FACILITY_SNO,ap.APP_APPROVEDBY,decode(ap.APP_LOANTYPE,'P','Retail','C','Corp','A','Agri') APP_LOANTYPE, ap.APP_APPLNHOLDER,ap.APP_USRID from facilities a,FACILITY_CORP b ,mis_appdetails c, prd_activitycodes d,APPLICATIONS ap where a.FACILITY_APPNO=ap.APP_NO and a.FACILITY_APPNO=ap.app_no and c.APP_FACILITY_SNO=a.FACILITY_SNO and trunc(ap.APP_PROCESSDATE) between '^' and '^' and ap.APP_STATUS='pa' and a.FACILITY_TYPEFOR != 'P' and c.app_no=a.FACILITY_APPNO and ap.APP_RENEW_FLAG in ('F','R') and a.FACILITY_CODE=b.COM_FACID and d.prdact_prdcode=a.FACILITY_CODE and d.PRDACT_MODULE in ('a') and d.prdact_activitycode like '%'||c.APP_ACTIVITYCODE||'%' and ap.APP_LOANTYPE='A'
select FINACLE_REQ_UUID.nextval from dual
UPDATE APP_POST_SANCTION SET DEC_LIMIT_EMI=? WHERE PS_APP_NO=? and PS_APP_SNO=?
Select PERAPP_CBSID from PERAPPLICANT pp, PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where pp.PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and pd.DEMO_APPNO='^'

Select old.LOAN_RECMDAMT as oldloanRecmamt ,new.LOAN_RECMDAMT as newloanRecmamt,new.LOAN_REQTERMS as newtenor, old.LOAN_REQTERMS as oldtenor from LOANDETAILS_PS old,LOANDETAILS new where old.LOAN_PROPOSEDAPPNO=new.LOAN_APPNO and new.LOAN_APPNO='^'

Select new.FACILITY_SANCAMT as newsancamt ,old.FACILITY_SANCAMT as oldsancamt,new.FACILITY_MONTHS as newtenor, old.FACILITY_MONTHS as oldtenor from FACILITIES new, FACILITIES_PS old where new.FACILITY_APPNO=old.FACILITY_PROPOSEDAPPNO and new.FACILITY_SNO=old.FACILITY_PROPOSEDSNO and new.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and new.FACILITY_SNO='^'

insert into LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF (SOL_ID,PROPOSAL_NUM,PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,PAR_PROPOSAL_NUM,PAR_PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,FORACID,CUST_ID,UNDO_FLG,POST_SANC_DATE,RCRE_TIME,USER_ID,OLD_SANCT_LIM,NEW_SANCT_LIM,DEC_LIMIT_EMI,POST_SANC_TYPE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N',TO_DATE((SELECT TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),SYSDATE,?,?,?,?,'DEC_LIMIT')

insert into LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF (SOL_ID,PROPOSAL_NUM,PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,PAR_PROPOSAL_NUM,PAR_PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,FORACID,CUST_ID,UNDO_FLG,POST_SANC_DATE,RCRE_TIME,USER_ID,OLD_SANCT_LIM,NEW_SANCT_LIM,DEC_LIMIT_EMI,POST_SANC_TYPE,ACCT_OCCP_CODE,SCST_CODE,MINORITY_CODE,SERVICE_AREA_CODE,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,NATURE_OF_ADVN,TYPE_OF_ADVN,MODE_OF_ADVN,FREE_CODE_3,GUAR_COVER_CODE,BSR_OCCU_CODE,LBR_CODE,NEW_ACTIVITY_CODE,NEW_ALLIED_ACTIVITY_CODE,NEW_FREECODE6,NEW_SECTOR,NEW_SUB_SECTOR,NEW_FREECODE7_FIN,NEW_FREECODE8_FIN,NEW_SENSITIVESECTOR,LAND_HOLDING_CODE,TWENTY_POINT_CODE,GOVT_SCHEME,OLD_ACTIVITY_CODE,OLD_ALLIED_ACTIVITY_CODE,OLD_FREECODE6,OLD_SECTOR,OLD_SUB_SECTOR,OLD_FREECODE7_FIN,OLD_FREECODE8_FIN,OLD_SENSITIVESECTOR,OLD_MIS_DETAILS,SHG_CODE,BANKING_TYPE,SCHEMATIC_CODE,BORROWER_CATEGORY_CODE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N',TO_DATE((SELECT TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),SYSDATE,?,?,?,?,'DEC_LIMIT',?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select PRD_CODE from PRODUCTS where PRD_WHTDIGIPRD='Y' and PRD_TYPE='^' and ^ between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to and PRD_REPAYTYPE like '%^%' and PRD_STOP='n' and prd_renew='n' and PRD_BANKSCHEME='^' order by PRD_INTRO_DATE desc

Select PC.APPNO,PC.FACILITY_SNO,PC.PURPOSEOFADV,PC.NATUREOFADV,PC.TYPEOFADV,PC.MODEOFADV,PC.FREECODE3,MA.APP_GUARANTEE,MA.APP_BSRCODE,MA.APP_BSR1CODE,MA.APP_WHETHERSERVICE, MA.APP_ACTIVITYCODE,MA.APP_ALLIED_ACTIVITYCODE,PC.FREECODE6,mac.APP_SECTOR,mac.APP_SUBSECTOR,PC.FREECODE7FINCODE,PC.FREECODE8FINCODE,mac.APP_SENSITIVESECTOR, MAS.APP_FARMERCATEGORY,mac.APP_TWENTYPOINTPGM from PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA PC,MIS_APPDETAILS MA,MIS_APPCLASSIFICATION mac,MIS_APPDISPLAYSCREEN MAS where PC.APPNO=MA.APP_NO and PC.FACILITY_SNO=MA.APP_FACILITY_SNO and mac.APP_NO=PC.APPNO and mac.APP_FACILITY_SNO=PC.FACILITY_SNO and MAS.APP_NO=PC.APPNO and MAS.APP_FACILITY_SNO=PC.FACILITY_SNO and PC.APPNO='^' and PC.FACILITY_SNO='^'

Select PC.APPNO,PC.FACILITY_SNO,PC.PURPOSEOFADV,PC.NATUREOFADV,PC.TYPEOFADV,PC.MODEOFADV,PC.FREECODE3,MA.APP_GUARANTEE,MA.APP_BSRCODE,MA.APP_BSR1CODE,MA.APP_WHETHERSERVICE, MA.APP_ACTIVITYCODE,MA.APP_ALLIED_ACTIVITYCODE,PC.FREECODE6,mac.APP_SECTOR,mac.APP_SUBSECTOR,PC.FREECODE7FINCODE,PC.FREECODE8FINCODE,mac.APP_SENSITIVESECTOR, MAS.APP_FARMERCATEGORY,mac.APP_TWENTYPOINTPGM from PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA_PS PC,MIS_APPDETAILS_PS MA,MIS_APPCLASSIFICATION_ps mac,MIS_APPDISPLAYSCREEN_ps MAS where PC.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO=MA.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO and PC.APP_PROPOSEDSNO=MA.APP_PROPOSEDSNO and mac.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO=PC.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO and mac.APP_PROPOSEDSNO=PC.APP_PROPOSEDSNO and MAS.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO=PC.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO and MAS.APP_PROPOSEDSNO=PC.APP_PROPOSEDSNO and PC.APP_PROPOSEDAPPNO='^' and PC.APP_PROPOSEDSNO='^'
select loan_recmdamt, loan_docrecvd, loan_specialcust,GOVT_SCHEME,LOAN_GOVT from loandetails_ps where LOAN_PROPOSEDAPPNO = '^'
select facility_propbanktype from FACILITIES where FACILITY_APPNO ='^' and FACILITY_SNO='^'
select facility_propbanktype from FACILITIES_PS where FACILITY_PROPOSEDAPPNO ='^' and FACILITY_PROPOSEDSNO='^'

select o.org_scode,o.org_code,o.org_name, p.perapp_cbsid,cs.cus_sec_id,to_char(cs.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE1 from perapplicant p,organisations o,CUS_SECURITIES cs,security_master sm,app_securitydetails aps,applications a,loandetails l, PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA pc where months_between (sysdate,to_date(cs.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE)) > (select loan_paramval from other_parameters where loan_paramslno='101') and (p.perapp_renew='n' or p.perapp_renew is null) and sm.sec_id=cs.cus_sec_type and (cs.CUS_RELEASEFLAG!='Y' or cs.CUS_RELEASEFLAG is null) and o.org_scode=(case when a.app_orglevel='C' then l.LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH when a.app_orglevel='D' then l.LOAN_PERTAINS_BRANCH else pc.LOANDISBBRANCH end) and cs.cus_sec_id=aps.APP_SEC_SECID and aps.APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID=p.perapp_oldid and pc.appno=a.app_No and a.app_no=aps.APP_SEC_APPNO and a.app_no=l.loan_appno and aps.app_sec_loantype='P' and a.app_loantype='P' and a.app_status ='pa' and nvl(a.app_delflag,'N')='N' and cs.cus_sec_type in ('10','11','12','13','14','15','16','17','19','20') union all select o.org_scode,o.org_code,o.org_name, p.perapp_cbsid,cs.cus_sec_id,to_char(cs.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE1 from perapplicant p,organisations o,CUS_SECURITIES cs,security_master sm,app_securitydetails aps,applications a,facilities f,COM_BRIEFBACKGROUND cb, PER_CUSCBSACCOUNTDATA pc where months_between (sysdate,to_date(cs.CUS_SEC_VALUATION_DATE)) > (select loan_paramval from other_parameters where loan_paramslno='101') and (p.perapp_renew='n' or p.perapp_renew is null) and sm.sec_id=cs.cus_sec_type and (cs.CUS_RELEASEFLAG!='Y' or cs.CUS_RELEASEFLAG is null) and o.org_scode=(case when cb.COM_PERTAINS_BRANCH is not null then (case when a.app_orglevel='C' then cb.COM_PERTAINS_BRANCH when a.app_orglevel='D' then cb.COM_PERTAINS_BRANCH else pc.LOANDISBBRANCH end) else pc.LOANDISBBRANCH end) and cs.cus_sec_id=aps.APP_SEC_SECID and aps.APP_SEC_BORROWER_ID=p.perapp_oldid and pc.appno=f.facility_appno and pc.facility_sno=f.FACILITY_SNO and a.app_no=aps.APP_SEC_APPNO and a.app_no=cb.COM_APPNO and aps.app_sec_loantype='P' and a.app_loantype in ('A','C') and f.facility_appno=aps.APP_SEC_APPNO and f.facility_sno=aps.APP_SEC_FACSNO and f.FACILITY_STATUS ='pa' and nvl(a.app_delflag,'N')='N' and cs.cus_sec_type in ('10','11','12','13','14','15','16','17','19','20')
order by ORG_SCODE,CUS_SEC_ID
DELETE FROM SECURITY_EXP_PENDING
INSERT INTO SECURITY_EXP_PENDING (SEC_SCODE,SEC_ORG,SEC_COUNT,TIME_AS_ON) values(?,?,?,SYSDATE)

SELECT to_char( L.LOAN_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as LOAN_DUEDATE FROM PRODUCTS P,APPLICATIONS A,LOANDETAILS L WHERE P.PRD_LOANTYPE='OD' AND A.APP_NO=L.LOAN_APPNO AND A.APP_PRDCODE=P.PRD_CODE and A.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and A.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and P.PRD_TYPE not in('pG','pR') and A.app_status='pa' and L.LOAN_APPNO='^'

select to_char(f.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as LOAN_DUEDATE from facility_corp fc,facilities f,APPLICATIONS A where fc.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE='OD' and f.facility_code=fc.COM_FACID and A.APP_NO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and A.APP_RENEW_FLAG!='P' and A.APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and A.app_status='pa' and f.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and f.FACILITY_SNO='^'
SELECT SEC_COUNT FROM SECURITY_EXP_PENDING WHERE SEC_ORG ='^'

UPDATE LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF SET POST_SANC_TYPE='DEC_LIMIT_EMI_PRD' ,OLD_DEC_PERIOD=?,NEW_DEC_PERIOD=?,NUM_OF_DMD_RAISED_CBS=?,TOT_NUMBER_DMD=?,ELIGIBLE_PRD_TO_DECR_CBS=?,ELIGIBLE_PRD_TO_DECR_LAPS_SANCT=? WHERE PROPOSAL_NUM=? and PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO=?

insert into LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF (SOL_ID,PROPOSAL_NUM,PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,PAR_PROPOSAL_NUM,PAR_PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,FORACID,CUST_ID,UNDO_FLG,POST_SANC_DATE,RCRE_TIME,USER_ID,OLD_DEC_PERIOD,NEW_DEC_PERIOD,NUM_OF_DMD_RAISED_CBS,TOT_NUMBER_DMD,ELIGIBLE_PRD_TO_DECR_CBS,POST_SANC_TYPE,ELIGIBLE_PRD_TO_DECR_LAPS_SANCT) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N',TO_DATE((SELECT TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),SYSDATE,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF (SOL_ID,PROPOSAL_NUM,PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,PAR_PROPOSAL_NUM,PAR_PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,FORACID,CUST_ID,UNDO_FLG,POST_SANC_DATE,RCRE_TIME,USER_ID,OLD_DEC_PERIOD,NEW_DEC_PERIOD,NUM_OF_DMD_RAISED_CBS,TOT_NUMBER_DMD,ELIGIBLE_PRD_TO_DECR_CBS,POST_SANC_TYPE,ACCT_OCCP_CODE,SCST_CODE,MINORITY_CODE,SERVICE_AREA_CODE,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,NATURE_OF_ADVN,TYPE_OF_ADVN,MODE_OF_ADVN,FREE_CODE_3,GUAR_COVER_CODE,BSR_OCCU_CODE,LBR_CODE,NEW_ACTIVITY_CODE,NEW_ALLIED_ACTIVITY_CODE,NEW_FREECODE6,NEW_SECTOR,NEW_SUB_SECTOR,NEW_FREECODE7_FIN,NEW_FREECODE8_FIN,NEW_SENSITIVESECTOR,LAND_HOLDING_CODE,TWENTY_POINT_CODE,GOVT_SCHEME,OLD_ACTIVITY_CODE,OLD_ALLIED_ACTIVITY_CODE,OLD_FREECODE6,OLD_SECTOR,OLD_SUB_SECTOR,OLD_FREECODE7_FIN,OLD_FREECODE8_FIN,OLD_SENSITIVESECTOR,OLD_MIS_DETAILS,SHG_CODE,BANKING_TYPE,SCHEMATIC_CODE,BORROWER_CATEGORY_CODE,ELIGIBLE_PRD_TO_DECR_LAPS_SANCT) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N',TO_DATE((SELECT TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),SYSDATE,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

SELECT NEW.LOAN_REQTERMS new_tenor,OLD.LOAN_REQTERMS old_tenor,OLD.LOAN_REQTERMS-NEW.LOAN_REQTERMS diff_tenor,A.APP_PARENT_APPNO as parent_no,A.APP_NO ,(Select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=A.APP_PARENT_APPNO) as cbs_no FROM APPLICATIONS A, LOANDETAILS NEW,LOANDETAILS OLD WHERE A.APP_NO=NEW.LOAN_APPNO and A.APP_PARENT_APPNO=OLD.LOAN_APPNO and A.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and A.APP_RENEW_FLAG='P' and A.APP_NO='^'

SELECT NEW.FACILITY_MONTHS new_tenor,OLD.FACILITY_MONTHS old_tenor,OLD.FACILITY_MONTHS-NEW.FACILITY_MONTHS diff_tenor ,OLD.CBS_ACCOUNTNO as cbs_no FROM FACILITIES NEW,FACILITIES OLD WHERE NEW.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO=OLD.FACILITY_APPNO and NEW.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO=OLD.FACILITY_SNO and NEW.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and NEW.FACILITY_SNO='^'

Select org.org_scode sol_id,appl.app_no APP_NO,'1' as SlNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_NO PARENT_APPNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_SNO PARENT_SLNO ,(Select PERAPP_CBSID from perApplicant where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID) as cbsid,(select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from applications where APP_NO=appl.APP_PARENT_APPNO) CBS_ACCOUNTNO,post.PS_MODIFY_TERMS as PS_MODIFY_TERMS,post.DEC_LIMIT_EMI as DEC_LIMIT_EMI, (Select PERAPP_CONSTITUTION from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID) as PERAPP_CONSTITUTION,ps.PRD_LOANTYPE,to_char(ld.LOAN_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as LOAN_DUEDATE,ps.prd_bankscheme ,ld.LOAN_REQTERMS,to_char(CASE WHEN ld.LOAN_REQTERMS='0' THEN ld.LOAN_DUEDATE WHEN ld.LOAN_REQTERMS='' THEN ld.LOAN_DUEDATE ELSE ADD_MONTHS(ld.LOAN_DUEDATE,ld.LOAN_REQTERMS-oldld.LOAN_REQTERMS) END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS due_tn from applications appl join app_post_sanction post on post.ps_app_no=appl.app_no join ORGANISATIONS org on org.org_code=appl.APP_ORGCODE join PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd on pd.DEMO_APPNO=appl.APP_PARENT_APPNO join PRODUCTS ps on ps.PRD_CODE=appl.APP_PRDCODE join LOANDETAILS ld on ld.LOAN_APPNO=appl.app_no join LOANDETAILS oldld on oldld.LOAN_APPNO=appl.APP_PARENT_APPNO where appl.app_renew_flag='P'and appl.APP_LOANTYPE ='P' and (select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from applications where APP_NO=appl.APP_PARENT_APPNO) is not null and pd.DEMO_TYPE='a' and appl.APP_NO='^'

Select org.org_scode sol_id,fac.FACILITY_APPNO APP_NO,fac.FACILITY_SNO as SlNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_NO PARENT_APPNO,post.PS_OLD_APP_SNO PARENT_SLNO ,(Select PERAPP_CBSID from perApplicant where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as cbsid,(select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) CBS_ACCOUNTNO,post.PS_MODIFY_TERMS,post.DEC_LIMIT_EMI, (Select PERAPP_CONSTITUTION from PERAPPLICANT where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_COMAPPNEWID) as PERAPP_CONSTITUTION, to_char(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as FACILITY_DUEDATE,fc.COM_FACILITY_LOANTYPE,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS, to_char(CASE WHEN fac.FACILITY_MONTHS='0' THEN fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE WHEN fac.FACILITY_MONTHS='' THEN fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE ELSE ADD_MONTHS(fac.FACILITY_DUEDATE,fac.FACILITY_MONTHS-oldfac.FACILITY_MONTHS) END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS due_tn from applications appl join facilities fac on fac.FACILITY_APPNO=appl.app_no join app_post_sanction post on post.ps_app_no=fac.FACILITY_APPNO and post.PS_APP_SNO=fac.FACILITY_SNO join ORGANISATIONS org on org.org_code=appl.APP_ORGCODE join COM_DEMOGRAPHICS pd on pd.DEMO_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO join facility_corp fc on fc.COM_FACID=fac.facility_code join facilities oldfac on fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO=oldfac.FACILITY_APPNO and fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO=oldfac.FACILITY_SNO where appl.APP_LOANTYPE in ('A','C') and appl.APP_RENEW_FLAG='P' and fac.facility_sancstatus='A' and (select CBS_ACCOUNTNO from facilities where FACILITY_APPNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPNO and FACILITY_SNO=fac.FACILITY_OLDAPPSNO) is not null and (select cop.COM_LOANACC from com_otherdet cop where cop.FACILITY_CODE = fac.facility_code) ='Y' and appl.APP_NO='^'

select PRD_CODE from PRODUCTS where PRD_WHTDIGIPRD='Y' and PRD_TYPE='^' and ^ between prd_rng_from and prd_rng_to and PRD_REPAYTYPE like '%^%' and PRD_STOP='n' and prd_renew='n' and PRD_BANKSCHEME='^' and PRD_CATID='^' order by PRD_INTRO_DATE desc

insert into LAPS_POSTSANCTION_AIF (SOL_ID,PROPOSAL_NUM,PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,PAR_PROPOSAL_NUM,PAR_PROPOSAL_FAC_SNO,FORACID,CUST_ID, UNDO_FLG,POST_SANC_DATE,RCRE_TIME,USER_ID,POST_SANC_TYPE,LAPS_EXST_MOR_PRD,LAPS_NEW_MOR_PRD,COMPLETED_MOR_CBS,LAPS_EXST_COURSE_PRD,NEW_COURSE_PRD) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N',TO_DATE((SELECT TO_CHAR(APP_PROCESSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from APPLICATIONS where APP_NO=?),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),SYSDATE,?,'VID_EXTENSION_MOROTORIUM_COURSE',?,?,?,?,?)

select SUM(ld.LOAN_RECMDAMT) as combk_limit from PERAPPLICANT P,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS PD,APPLICATIONS A,PRODUCTS PR,LOANDETAILS ld where P.PERAPP_CBSID=(SElect PERAPP_CBSID from PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd1,PERAPPLICANT p1 where pd1.DEMO_APPNO='^' and pd1.DEMO_APPID =p1.PERAPP_ID and pd1.DEMO_TYPE='a') and pd.DEMO_APPID =p.PERAPP_ID and A.APP_NO=pd.DEMO_APPNO and PR.PRD_CODE=A.APP_PRDCODE and ld.LOAN_APPNO=A.APP_NO and PR.PRD_TYPE='pH' and PR.PRD_PURPOSE!='T' and PD.DEMO_TYPE='a' and A.APP_RENEW_FLAG='F' and A.APP_STATUS='pa' and A.APP_LOANTYPE='P' and A.APP_NO!='^'

select valuer_orgcode as org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate ,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR( valuer_expirydate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_expdateofsanc,valuers_detofsecdep,TO_CHAR(valuers_jewappdateofagr, 'DD/MM/YYYY')as valuers_jewappdateofagr, valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC,(select VALUERS_MAKER_ACTIVEFLAG from VALUERSMASTER_MAKER where VALUERS_MAKER_SEQNO = valuers_seqno and VALUERS_MAKER_ACTIVEFLAG = 'ACTIVE' and VALUERS_MAKER_FLAG != 'A') as VALUERS_MAKER_ACTIVEFLAG from valuersmaster, laps_cities lc, laps_states ls,valuer_orgdetails where (valuer_orgcode like '^%') and VALUERS_COMPANY is null and VALUERS_EMPLOYEE ='Y' and valappflag='^' and VALUERS_EMPCOMPANY='^' and valuer_cbsid is not null and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and valuer_seqno=VALUERS_SEQNO and VALUER_MAKERFLAG is null order by valuers_code

select valuer_orgcode as org_code, valuers_code, valuers_name, valuers_address1, valuers_address2, valuers_address3, valuers_city, valuers_state, valuers_pincode, valuers_country, valuers_off_phoneno, valuers_off_faxno, valuers_res_phoneno, valuers_res_mobno, valuers_contper, valuers_contper_phmobno, valuers_design, valuers_email, TO_CHAR( valuers_empaneleddt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_empaneleddt, valuers_active, valuers_comments, valuers_blacklist, TO_CHAR( valuers_blacklistdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_blacklistdate ,city_name, state_name, valuers_seqno,valuers_sancrefno,TO_CHAR( valuer_expirydate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as valuers_expdateofsanc,valuers_detofsecdep,TO_CHAR(valuers_jewappdateofagr, 'DD/MM/YYYY')as valuers_jewappdateofagr, valuer_cbsid,VALUER_VALUATIONNATURE,VALUER_CATEGORYCODE,VALUER_VALUEDLOC,(select VALUERS_MAKER_ACTIVEFLAG from VALUERSMASTER_MAKER where VALUERS_MAKER_SEQNO = valuers_seqno and VALUERS_MAKER_ACTIVEFLAG = 'ACTIVE' and VALUERS_MAKER_FLAG != 'A') as VALUERS_MAKER_ACTIVEFLAG ,VALUERS_COMPANY from valuersmaster, laps_cities lc, laps_states ls,valuer_orgdetails where (valuer_orgcode like '^%') and VALUERS_COMPANY is null and VALUERS_EMPLOYEE='Y' and VALUERS_EMPCOMPANY='^' and valappflag='^' and valuer_cbsid is not null and state_code(+)=valuers_state and city_code(+)=valuers_city and lc.STATE_ID=ls.STATE_ID and valuer_seqno=VALUERS_SEQNO and VALUER_MAKERFLAG is null order by valuers_code

select org.ORG_SCODE,org.ORG_NAME,(select ORG_NAME from organisations orga where orga.ORG_CODE like SUBSTR(org.ORG_CODE,1,6)||'%' and orga.ORG_LEVEL='R') as REGIONAL_OFFICE,ja.JA_APPRAISERCBSID,app.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,app.APP_PROCESSDATE,ld.LOAN_RECMDAMT, (Select PERAPP_CBSID from perApplicant where PERAPP_ID=pd.DEMO_APPID) as cbsid,ja.JA_NAME from JEWEL_APPRAISERDETAILS ja,APPLICATIONS app,ORGANISATIONS org, LOANDETAILS ld,PER_DEMOGRAPHICS pd where app.APP_ORGCODE=org.ORG_CODE and ja.JA_APPNO=app.APP_NO and ld.LOAN_APPNO=ja.JA_APPNO and ld.LOAN_APPNO=app.APP_NO and pd.DEMO_APPNO=ja.JA_APPNO and trunc(JA_VALDATE) between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and JA_COMP_CBSID='^' ^

update com_termscond set TERMS_STATUS='Y',TERMS_SUPPORTDOC='N' where TERMS_APPNO= ? and TERMS_ID='3371'

SELECT f.facility_sno FROM facilities f,facility_corp b,APP_SECURITYDETAILS app,CUS_SECURITIES cs, APP_POST_SANCTION aps where f.facility_appno=app.APP_SEC_APPNO and app.APP_SEC_FACSNO=f.facility_sno and f.facility_code=b.com_facid and app.APP_SEC_SECID=cs.CUS_SEC_ID and aps.PS_APP_NO=f.facility_appno and aps.PS_APP_SNO=f.facility_sno and b.COM_FACILITY_EMISCHEME ='SLGEN' and CUS_SEC_CLASSIFICATION='28' and (PS_MODIFY_TERMS like 'SEC@' OR PS_MODIFY_TERMS like 'MODSEC@') and f.facility_appno='^'
update app_termsandcond set APP_TERMPRINT='',TERMS_SUPPORTDOC='' where APP_TERMAPPNO= ? and TERM_SNO in ('3412','3413','3414')
update app_termsandcond set APP_TERMPRINT='Y',TERMS_SUPPORTDOC='N' where APP_TERMAPPNO= ? and TERM_SNO in ('3412','3413','3414')
